STATUS_UNVERIFIED: This record has not yet been verified.

STATUS_PENDING: Verification is still pending. If it's been more than an hour since submission, try again soon.

STATUS_UPSTREAM_ERROR: The verification process encountered a network error communicating with the backend. Try again in a moment.

STATUS_LOCAL_PROOF_NONE: No proof was found in the database. Possibly evidence that the record has been tampered-with.

STATUS_LOCAL_PROOF_INVALID: An invalid local proof was found. Evidence that the record has been tampered-with.

STATUS_LOCAL_HASH_INVALID: An invalid local hash was found. Evidence that the record has been tampered-with.

STATUS_REMOTE_HASH_INVALID_NO_DATA: No remote hash was found. Evidence that the record has been tampered-with.

STATUS_REMOTE_HASH_INVALID_NO_HASH: An invalid remote hash found. Evidence that the record has been tampered-with.

STATUS_UUID_INVALID: An invalid UUID was sent for verification. Evidence that the record has been tampered-with.
